pr_title: [DOCS] Document that doc_as_upsert does not support ingest pipelines

timeline.message:
Add note about pipeline not usable with doc_as_upsert

https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/30724

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Using pipelines with `doc_as_upsert` is not possible.
          
          
            
            Using <<ingest,ingest pipelines>> with `doc_as_upsert` is not supported.
timeline.author: jrodewig
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -333,3 +333,7 @@ POST test/_update/1
 }
 --------------------------------------------------
 // TEST[continued]
+[NOTE]
+====
+Using pipelines with `doc_as_upsert` is not possible.
